notes.title: JavaScript — Dynamic client-side scripting
notes.body: JavaScript is a programming language that allows you to implement complex things on web pages. Every time a web page does more than just sit there and display static information for you to look at—displaying timely content updates, interactive maps, animated 2D/3D graphics, scrolling video jukeboxes, or more—you can bet that JavaScript is probably involved.

notes.title: @tailwindcss/line-clamp
